testsuite.name: TodoList.TodoListTest

testcase.name: AddTask should add a task to the todo list
ShowTaskByDate should show the task by date in order by due date
Show task by project should show the task in order by project
Mark as done should mark the task as done and change the value false to true
ConvertToDate should convert the date to String
Remove task should remove the task

testsuite.system-out: Marking Task{title='title', dueDate=2020-01-01, user='user', project='project', isDone=Done} as completed
